textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live 10/18/2010 (AP) – Oklahoma and Oregon are in the top spots of the first BCS standings of the season, leaving Boise State chasing a spot in the national championship game. Oklahoma, Oregon Ahead Of Boise St In BCS 10/25/2010 NEW YORK (AP) Cam Newton and Auburn blew by Boise State into first place in the BCS standings.
